Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se luksuzna kuća u mjestu Privlaka. Kuća se nalazi na parceli ukupne površine od 611 m2.Stambena građevina je tlocrtnom projekcijom pravokutnik L forme oblikavana kao 2 veća volumena koja su povezana.Stambena površina kuće iznosi 192 m2 te se sastoji od ulaznog prostora, kuhinje s blagovaonicom, dnevnog boravka, 4 prostrane spavaće soba, svaka sa svojom vlastitom kupaonicom, zasebnog wc-a te terase.U dvorištu kuće, nalazi se bazen, dimenzije 8x4 m s ugrađenim jacuzzijem, vanjski roštilj sa spremištem te popločano i uređeno sunčalište.Svaka spavaća soba u kući, kao i dnevni boravak ima direktan izlaz na bazen.Okućnica je hortikulturno uređena autohtonim biljkama. Na južnom dijelu kuće, osiguran je pristup za vozila koji vodi do 4 vanjska parkirna mjesta.Prilikom izgradnje korišteni su najkvalitetniji materijali, vrhunska PVC stolarija te zvučna i toplinska izolacija po najvišim standardima suvremene gradnje.Kuća je trenutno u izgradnji, planirani završetak gradnje je 7/2023.Za sve ostale informacije, kontaktirajte ured. Luxury house for sale in Privlaka. The house is located on a plot with a total area of 611 m2.The residential building is an L-shaped rectangle with a ground plan projection and is shaped as 2 larger volumes that are connected.The living area of the house is 192 m2 and consists of an entrance area, a kitchen with a dining room, a living room, 4 spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, a separate toilet and a terrace.In the yard of the house, there is a swimming pool, dimensions 8x4 m with a built-in jacuzzi, an outdoor grill with storage, and a paved and decorated sunbathing area.Every bedroom in the house, as well as the living room, has direct access to the pool.The yard is horticulturally decorated with autochthonous plants. On the southern part of the house, there is access for vehicles leading to 4 outdoor parking spaces.During construction, the highest quality materials were used, top quality PVC carpentry and sound and thermal insulation according to the highest standards of modern construction.The house is currently under construction, the planned completion date is July 2023.For all other information, contact the office.
